description:
Shuusuke Takanashi is a high school student that has started seeing his little sister Nao as a target for his fantasies. However, Nao doesn`t mind this at all... in fact, she loves seeing her brother`s nervous reactions whenever she encourages his perverted behavior by giving him a glimpse of her panties, or clinging to him all the time... all while pretending to just be a good little sister.
One day Nao sneaks into Shuusuke`s room on the pretense of cleaning it up, but instead goes to take a look at all of his naughty magazines... but she also finds something she never expected to come across...

titles.title: Ani to Imouto no Yokoshima na Nichijou
The Naughty Life of a Brother and Sister
兄と妹のヨコシマな日常
